text:
This litter kicks up absolutely NO dust at all! Not when you pour it in the box and not when you scoop the box. The litter I normally use sends up clouds of dust anytime the litter is disturbed, including when the cats are digging around in it. The area around the large box I have constantly needs dusting and sweeping.

It doesn't seem to be tracking outside of the box either. My boxes are actually large sterilite plastic tubs, I have huge cats and they don't fit in most boxes, so they have to literally jump out of the box. Even though I have rugs around them to catch stray litter, they still manege to track litter all over. Since I started using this litter, the tracking is nominal. The clumps are fairly hard and don't break up when scooping, so it scoops clean. There is no apparent odor to it, and my cats didn't seem to notice the change in the litter.

I live in a household with multiple cats using the boxes and even though I scoop twice daily, as the litter ages, the odor starts to come out. I will update the review once I can tell if that's not as bad either, but for now, I'd recommend this to anyone looking for a quality litter. I even sent some to a friend who is highly allergic to dust and she hasn't indicated any problems with it.

text:
I honestly don‚Äôt think I‚Äôve ever been so excited to write a raving review in my life! This litter is legit. Let me begin by saying; we are a 3 kitty family. So, anywhere we can save when it comes to animal cost is major, because of that we have been purchasing a brand name litter from Costco for years now. The litter box is kept in the laundry room and my kids are usually on litter duty so I never really noticed an issue, with the exception of dust build up. Recently, I took over scooping, and oh my good gracious, the amount of dust cloud that came from that old litter was enough to give you an allergy attack. Not to mention, the increasing amount of litter dust throughout my laundry room. GROSS!
Anyways, I decided I had enough and looked into an alternative option. That‚Äôs when I found this Cloud control litter by arm & hammer. I am in absolute awe of this litter and its lack of dust or cloudy aftermath! Like, literal shock and so mad at myself for not buying it sooner. The litter itself is more of a sand like texture, so a bit lighter than other litters. It seems to clump well, and scoop easily. Although because of the texture, it does track a bit more than our old one. No biggie if you have a litter mat! The smell is a nice clean fresh scent, but not overwhelming or artificial smelling. I honestly don‚Äôt know if the 14 day claim on this litter is accurate, because I just started using it and I was too darn excited about the product that I just had to stop and write this review. I also immediately ordered another box to have as backup and now have this litter on my subscription. It‚Äôs is a bit more on the pricey side, but I would say the value of this litter is 100 percent worth a bit more cost.
